title: Reverse Words in a String
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a string as input and reverses the order of words in the string.

title: Check Even/Odd
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a Number and returns 'Even' or 'Odd'

title: Double the number
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a number as input and returns Double of the number.

title: Capitalizes the String
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a string as input and Capitalizes the first letter of each word in a string.

title: Count The words
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a string as input and return the number of words in the string.

title: Half the number
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a number as input and returns Half of the number.

title: Reverse the String
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a string as input and return reverse string.

title: Count the Vowel
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a string as input and return count of vowel in string.

title: Square of the number
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a number as input and returns Square of the number.

title: Covert Hour in Seconds
instruction: Write a JavaScript function that takes a Hour as input and returns Seconds.
